Andres - 

A number of years back a group of women from the Chicago area pu=
t on an absolutely awesome demonstration of naginata usage, the first (and =
last) I've ever experienced. It would be an interesting demonstration to ag=
ain present at one of our sword shows particularly for us non-martial arts =
guys and gals. 

Ron

nks for the info on Kendo World and the Naginata book. I'll look

 years ago. I'm still a rank beginner, but I'm very
